features: These stunning bangles feature intricate floral latticework, studded with sparkling Polki diamonds and vibrant green emeralds. description: These bangles blend heritage with luxury. The antique finish and Mughal-inspired design make them a timeless heirloom piece. The genuine emeralds and Polki diamonds ensure brilliance and value, reflecting the wearer's refined taste. They are comfortable to wear, durable, and a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. A true testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making tradition.
